pullrequest.title: Model submission for X2 sensor configuration 8 by SSCI

content.raw: This either needs to go back to \+-135 degrees \(preferred\) or it needs to be modeled after a real sensor and the specific sensor needs to be linked here. These parameters do not match the original sensor nor the other sensor mentioned \([https://www.slamtec.com/en/Lidar/S1Spec](https://www.slamtec.com/en/Lidar/S1Spec)\).
content.html: This either needs to go back to +-135 degrees (preferred) or it needs to be modeled after a real sensor and the specific sensor needs to be linked here. These parameters do not match the original sensor nor the other sensor mentioned (https://www.slamtec.com/en/Lidar/S1Spec).

pullrequest.title: Model submission for X2 sensor configuration 8 by SSCI

content.raw: Please add a `example.ign` launch file in the `launch` directory and `worlds/example.sdf`. Adding [this launch file](#!/osrf/subt/src/urban_circuit/submitted_models/explorer_x1_sensor_config_1/launch/example.ign) and [this world file](#!/osrf/subt/src/urban_circuit/submitted_models/explorer_x1_sensor_config_1/worlds/example.sdf) should suffice.
content.html: Please add a example.ign launch file in the launch directory and worlds/example.sdf. Adding this launch file and this world file should suffice.

pullrequest.title: Model submission for X2 sensor configuration 8 by SSCI

content.raw:
There is a small error in your xacro file which causes it to be unparseable:  

```
diff -r 3af31acfdebb submitted_models/ssci_x2_sensor_config_8/urdf/model.xacro
--- a/submitted_models/ssci_x2_sensor_config_8/urdf/model.xacro Wed Dec 11 10:17:59 2019 -0500
+++ b/submitted_models/ssci_x2_sensor_config_8/urdf/model.xacro Wed Dec 11 11:07:01 2019 -0600
@@ -1,5 +1,5 @@
 <?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
-<robot name='X2'>
+<robot name='X2' xmlns:xacro="http://ros.org/wiki/xacro">
   <xacro:arg name="name" default="X3"/>
   <link name='{name}/base_link'>
     <inertial>
```

‌
content.html:
There is a small error in your xacro file which causes it to be unparseable: 

diff -r 3af31acfdebb submitted_models/ssci_x2_sensor_config_8/urdf/model.xacro
--- a/submitted_models/ssci_x2_sensor_config_8/urdf/model.xacro Wed Dec 11 10:17:59 2019 -0500
+++ b/submitted_models/ssci_x2_sensor_config_8/urdf/model.xacro Wed Dec 11 11:07:01 2019 -0600
@@ -1,5 +1,5 @@
 <?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
-<robot name='X2'>
+<robot name='X2' xmlns:xacro="http://ros.org/wiki/xacro">
   <xacro:arg name="name" default="X3"/>
   <link name='{name}/base_link'>
     <inertial>

‌

pullrequest.title: Model submission for X2 sensor configuration 8 by SSCI

content.raw:
Sensors all look good, but I’m having some issues with the robot description:

```
[ERROR] [1576084096.631870929, 42.516000000]: Failed to build tree: child link [front_left_wheel] of joint [front_left_wheel_joint] not found
[ERROR] [1576084097.632665686, 42.960000000]: Failed to build tree: child link [front_left_wheel] of joint [front_left_wheel_joint] not found
```

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/3960350573-rviz_screenshot_2019_12_11-11_18_19.png)

Hi Michael, 

I noticed we were missing the link to parents in some parts of the description. Could you update to the latest and check if it works now?

Hi Michael,

I noticed we were missing the link to parents in some parts of the description. Could you update to the latest and check if it works now?

pullrequest.title: Model submission for X2 sensor configuration 8 by SSCI

content.raw:
Okay, the tree is in better shape, but you’ll need to use the fully-qualified paths for the mesh resources in the package.  Here is a diff: [https://gist.github.com/mjcarroll/4348a1881e74b36efc6ff65f773ec358](https://gist.github.com/mjcarroll/4348a1881e74b36efc6ff65f773ec358)

You’ll likely need to do the same for other models.
content.html:
Okay, the tree is in better shape, but you’ll need to use the fully-qualified paths for the mesh resources in the package. Here is a diff: https://gist.github.com/mjcarroll/4348a1881e74b36efc6ff65f773ec358

You’ll likely need to do the same for other models.

pullrequest.title: Model submission for X2 sensor configuration 8 by SSCI

content.raw: We originally had done it that way \(with package:// paths\), but were led to believe that that was unnecessary or undesirable by the online documentation for urdf files.  We can adjust all the urdf files to use the package paths.
content.html: We originally had done it that way (with package:// paths), but were led to believe that that was unnecessary or undesirable by the online documentation for urdf files. We can adjust all the urdf files to use the package paths.

pullrequest.title: Model submission for X2 sensor configuration 8 by SSCI

content.raw: Oops, let me verify that I haven’t steered you wrong here.  I couldn’t get the description to visualize locally in rviz without those paths set.
content.html: Oops, let me verify that I haven’t steered you wrong here. I couldn’t get the description to visualize locally in rviz without those paths set.

content.raw: Please check that your sensor parameters match [#!/osrf/subt/wiki/api](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/api) and [example models](#!/osrf/subt/src/urban_circuit/submitted_models/x3_sensor_config_5/model.sdf). For example, VGA RGBD camera has 640x480 resolution.

Can you submit a follow-up PR to adjust these please?
content.html:
@Derek Vasquez As I was updating the API documentation, I noticed that these parameters were never adjusted to match the description “VGA RGBD”

Can you submit a follow-up PR to adjust these please?

pullrequest.title: Model submission for X2 sensor configuration 8 by SSCI

content.raw:
This needs to be populated with more information i.e. :

‌

```
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<model>
  <name>X4 Config 6</name>
  <version>1.0</version>
  <sdf version="1.6">model.sdf</sdf>

  <author>
    <name>name</name>
    <email>email@email.com</email>
  </author>

  <description>
    X4 UAV with sensor configuration #6: VGA RGBD camera, IMU, pressure sensor, magnetometer, ceiling point sensor, floor point sensor.
  </description>
</model>
```

‌
content.html:
This needs to be populated with more information i.e. :

‌

<?xml version="1.0"?>
<model>
  <name>X4 Config 6</name>
  <version>1.0</version>
  <sdf version="1.6">model.sdf</sdf>

  <author>
    <name>name</name>
    <email>email@email.com</email>
  </author>

  <description>
    X4 UAV with sensor configuration #6: VGA RGBD camera, IMU, pressure sensor, magnetometer, ceiling point sensor, floor point sensor.
  </description>
</model>

‌

pullrequest.title: Model submission for X2 sensor configuration 8 by SSCI

content.raw:
This is the wrong resolution parameter to change.  This needs to be:
`<resolution>1</resolution>`
Please check your changes in RViz.
content.html: This is the wrong resolution parameter to change. This needs to be: <resolution>1</resolution> Please check your changes in RViz.

pullrequest.title: Model submission for X2 sensor configuration 8 by SSCI

content.raw: This resolution needs to be `<resolution>0.03</resolution>` as per https://www.slamtec.com/en/Lidar/S1Spec
content.html: This resolution needs to be <resolution>0.03</resolution> as per https://www.slamtec.com/en/Lidar/S1Spec

pullrequest.title: Model submission for X2 sensor configuration 8 by SSCI

content.raw:
I just put a couple of comments regarding RPLidar changes in the comments below.  Please make those changes and I'll approve this for further validation by OSRF.

Relevant diff of changes:
```

diff -r aad4432c508b submitted_models/ssci_x2_sensor_config_8/model.sdf
--- a/submitted_models/ssci_x2_sensor_config_8/model.sdf	Wed Dec 11 16:42:26 2019 -0700
+++ b/submitted_models/ssci_x2_sensor_config_8/model.sdf	Thu Dec 12 09:21:53 2019 -0500
@@ -354,7 +354,7 @@
                     <scan>
                         <horizontal>
                             <samples>920</samples>
-                            <resolution>0.03</resolution>
+                            <resolution>1</resolution>
                             <min_angle>-3.14159</min_angle>
                             <max_angle>3.14159</max_angle>
                         </horizontal>
@@ -362,7 +362,7 @@
                     <range>
                         <min>0.04</min>
                         <max>25</max>
-                        <resolution>0.01</resolution>
+                        <resolution>0.03</resolution>
                     </range>
                     <noise>
                         <type>gaussian</type>

```
content.html:
I just put a couple of comments regarding RPLidar changes in the comments below. Please make those changes and I'll approve this for further validation by OSRF.

Relevant diff of changes:

diff -r aad4432c508b submitted_models/ssci_x2_sensor_config_8/model.sdf
--- a/submitted_models/ssci_x2_sensor_config_8/model.sdf    Wed Dec 11 16:42:26 2019 -0700
+++ b/submitted_models/ssci_x2_sensor_config_8/model.sdf    Thu Dec 12 09:21:53 2019 -0500
@@ -354,7 +354,7 @@
                     <scan>
                         <horizontal>
                             <samples>920</samples>
-                            <resolution>0.03</resolution>
+                            <resolution>1</resolution>
                             <min_angle>-3.14159</min_angle>
                             <max_angle>3.14159</max_angle>
                         </horizontal>
@@ -362,7 +362,7 @@
                     <range>
                         <min>0.04</min>
                         <max>25</max>
-                        <resolution>0.01</resolution>
+                        <resolution>0.03</resolution>
                     </range>
                     <noise>
                         <type>gaussian</type>
